{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.12660v1", "title": "Complex tori constructed from Cayley-Dickson algebras", "summary": "In this paper we construct complex tori, denoted by $S_{\mathbb{B}_{1,p,q}}$,
as quotients of tensor products of Cayley--Dickson algebras, denoted
$\mathbb{B}_{1,p,q}=\mathbb{C}\otimes \mathbb{H}^{\otimes p}\otimes
\mathbb{O}^{\otimes q}$, with their integral subrings. We then show that these
complex tori have endomorphism rings of full rank and are isogenous to the
direct sum of $2^{2p+3q}$ copies of an elliptic curve $E$ of $j$-invariant
$1728$.", "main_category": "math.AG", "categories": "math.AG", "published": "2025-04-17T05:40:04Z"}
